channel.title: Npc's constantly twitch
channel.description: ya,i wanted to make a cleint form some servre base, and the one i chosen had a glitch, all the nps'c move for like 1 sec then twich back to their starting position

item.title: Npc's constantly twitch
item.dc:creator: @WhiteWolves WhiteWolves
item.description:
@WhiteWolves wrote:

lawl, i knew what the problem was =P

i asked if you know how to fix it,

is there anyway to turn off the animation?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc's constantly twitch
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

This is acually a problem nearly all servers have. All it is, is that the animations given to the npc are not a constant flow. So it goes to the model position. Then is given another animation and stuff. Then back to model position. So and on, and so forth. I am not sure how to fix, but thats basically the problem.

Read full topic
